description: Agent makes repo changes in schedule mode and opens a PR.

schedule.commandPrompt:
You are running in schedule mode. Use the write_file tool (not apply_patch) to:
1) Create docs/auto.md with a short paragraph about automated updates.
2) Overwrite docs/seed.md with exactly two lines: 'seed' and 'Automated update applied.'.
After writing files, commit them with commit_changes using message 'Scheduled docs update', then call push_pr with title 'Scheduled docs update' and body 'Automated docs update from scheduled run.'.
Do not modify any other files. Do not respond with prose; only use tools until everything is complete.
